! haaretz.co.il##span:has([href*="promo"]):xpath(..) is excluded by ":xpath(" in exclusions.txt
haaretz.co.il##span:has([href*="promo"]):xpath(..)
! &utm_campaign=$popup,third-party,domain=inn.co.il is excluded by "_campaign=$popup" in exclusions.txt
&utm_campaign=$popup,third-party,domain=inn.co.il
! Rule "haaretz.co.il##html:style(height: auto !important; overflow: auto !important)" converted to: haaretz.co.il#$#html { height: auto !important; overflow: auto !important }
haaretz.co.il##html:style(height: auto !important; overflow: auto !important)
! Rule "bhol.co.il##body:style(overflow: auto !important;)" converted to: bhol.co.il#$#body { overflow: auto !important; }
bhol.co.il##body:style(overflow: auto !important;)
! Rule "koozi.info##.tien-ads-video > div#player:style(visibility: visible!important;)" converted to: koozi.info#$#.tien-ads-video > div#player { visibility: visible!important; }
koozi.info##.tien-ads-video > div#player:style(visibility: visible!important;)
! Rule "koozi.info##.tien-ads-video:style(background: none!important;)" converted to: koozi.info#$#.tien-ads-video { background: none!important; }
koozi.info##.tien-ads-video:style(background: none!important;)
